name: yolo
description: Make sure that you have the following installed: - [node](https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-node-js-on-ubuntu-18-04)  - npm  - [MongoDB](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/tutorial/install-mongodb-on-ubuntu/) and start the mongodb service with `sudo service mongod start`
author: Evans Oloo
